Class ObjectStorage_TokenStore

(line 11)

Description




	Located in File: /lib/ObjectStorage/TokenStore.php





ObjectStorage token store  A token store is a place that ObjectStorage can store ObjectStorage authentication token for reusing it.


    
		
  • copyright: - Copyright (c) 2012 SoftLayer Technologies Inc. (http://www.softlayer.com)
